creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
If there are any bugs that should be resolved prior to a log4j 1.3.alpha9
release, please add them to the "Depends On" list.  I intend to change the
format of the version from "1.3.alpha-8" to "1.3.alpha9" since the hyphen
confuses Maven.
log4j 1.3 is abandoned.  1.3 alpha 9 won't happen.
creator: carnold@apache.org
